mapper.insert: insert into tbl_suggestion (suggestion_no, suggestion_content, product_no, user_id, role_type) values (seq_suggestion.NEXTVAL, #{suggestion_content}, #{product_no}, #{user_id}, #{role_type})
mapper.update: update tbl_suggestion set suggestion_content = #{suggestion_content}, user_id = #{user_id}, suggestion_upd_date = sysdate where suggestion_no = #{suggestion_no}
